testcase.classname: feature to test Jiva design Bulk Checking screen functionality
testcase.name: Verify the Expansion grids and Update functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed Then the User enters "Admin", and "Abcd@123"................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed Then Click on Woven Module..................................................passed Then Click on the Fabric Store Module.......................................passed And Click on the Fabric Bulk Checking under the Data Entry dropdown.........passed And User click on the filter Expansion......................................passed And Click on the Filter Icon in Style Expansion.............................passed And Select the "6529R" in the Search by IPO or PO field.....................passed And click on the Apply button...............................................passed And Select the IPO in the Styles List.......................................passed When Click on the Expansion icon the Lot Checking Data, Quality Checking Data, and Bulk Checking Data grids are displayed or not.passed And Update the Lot Checking Data............................................passed And CLick on the Update button..............................................passed
